verses.verse: Finally <WG3063>, my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, rejoice <WG5463> <WG5720> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>. To write <WG1125> <WG5721> the same things <WG846> to you <WG5213>, to me <WG1698> indeed <WG3303> is not <WG3756> grievous <WG3636>, but <WG1161> for you <WG5213> it is safe <WG804>.
Beware <WG991> <WG5720> of dogs <WG2965>, beware <WG991> <WG5720> of evil <WG2556> workers <WG2040>, beware <WG991> <WG5720> of the concision <WG2699>.

For <WG1063> we <WG2249> are <WG2070> <WG5748> the b'ritmilah <WG4061>, which <WG3588> worship <WG3000> <WG5723> 'Elohim <WG2316> in the spirit <WG4151>, and <WG2532> rejoice <WG2744> <WG5740> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, and <WG2532> have <WG3982> no <WG3756> confidence <WG3982> <WG5756> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>.

Though <WG2539> I <WG1473> might <WG2192> also <WG2532> have <WG2192> <WG5723> confidence <WG4006> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>. If any <WG1536> other man <WG243> thinketh <WG1380> <WG5719> that he hath whereof he might trust <WG3982> <WG5755> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>, I <WG1473> more <WG3123>:

Circumcised <WG4061> the eighth <WG3637> day, of <WG1537> the stock <WG1085> of Yisra'EL <WG2474>, of the tribe <WG5443> of Binyamin <WG958>, an Hebrew <WG1445> of <WG1537> the Hebrews <WG1445>; as touching <WG2596> the Torah <WG3551>, a Parush <WG5330>;

Concerning <WG2596> zeal <WG2205>, persecuting <WG1377> <WG5723> the Congregation <WG1577>; touching <WG2596> the righteousness <WG1343> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> the Torah <WG3551>, <WG1096> <WG5637> blameless <WG273>.
But <WG235> what things <WG3748> were <WG2258> <WG5713> gain <WG2771> to me <WG3427>, those <WG5023> I counted <WG2233> <WG5766> loss <WG2209> for <WG1223> Moshiach <WG5547>.

Yea <WG235> doubtless <WG3304>, and <WG2532> I count <WG2233> <WG5736> all things <WG3956> but loss <WG2209> for <WG1511> <WG5750> <WG1223> the excellency <WG5242> <WG5723> of the knowledge <WG1108> of Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> my <WG3450> YY <WG2962>: for <WG1223> whom <WG3739> I have suffered the loss <WG2210> <WG5681> of all things <WG3956>, and <WG2532> do count <WG2233> <WG5736> them <WG1511> <WG5750> but dung <WG4657>, that <WG2443> I may win <WG2770> <WG5661> Moshiach <WG5547>,

And <WG2532> be found <WG2147> <WG5686> in <WG1722> him <WG846>, not <WG3361> having <WG2192> <WG5723> mine own <WG1699> righteousness <WG1343>, which <WG3588> is of <WG1537> the Torah <WG3551>, but <WG235> that which <WG3588> is through <WG1223> the faith <WG4102> of Moshiach <WG5547>, the righteousness <WG1343> which <WG3588> is of <WG1537> 'Elohim <WG2316> by <WG1909> faith <WG4102>:

That I may know <WG1097> <WG5629> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> the power <WG1411> of his <WG846> resurrection <WG386>, and <WG2532> the fellowship <WG2842> of his <WG846> sufferings <WG3804>, being made conformable <WG4833> <WG5746> unto his <WG846> death <WG2288>;
If by any means <WG1513> I might attain <WG2658> <WG5661> unto <WG1519> the resurrection <WG1815> of the dead <WG3498>.

Not <WG3756> as though <WG3754> I had already <WG2235> attained <WG2983> <WG5627>, either <WG2228> were already <WG2235> perfect <WG5048> <WG5769>: but <WG1161> I follow after <WG1377> <WG5719>, if <WG1499> that I may apprehend <WG2638> <WG5632> that for <WG1909> which <WG3739> also <WG2532> I am apprehended <WG2638> <WG5681> of <WG5259> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>.

Brethren <WG80>, I <WG1473> count <WG3049> <WG5736> not <WG3756> myself <WG1683> to have apprehended <WG2638> <WG5760>: but <WG1161> this one thing <WG1520> I do, forgetting <WG1950> <WG5740> those things <WG3303> which are behind <WG3694>, and <WG1161> reaching forth unto <WG1901> <WG5740> those things which are before <WG1715>,
I press <WG1377> <WG5719> toward <WG2596> the mark <WG4649> for <WG1909> the prize <WG1017> of the high <WG507> calling <WG2821> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>.

Let <WG5426> us therefore <WG3767>, as many as <WG3745> be perfect <WG5046>, be <WG5426> thus <WG5124> minded <WG5426> <WG5725>: and <WG2532> if in any thing <WG1536> ye be <WG5426> otherwise <WG2088> minded <WG5426> <WG5719>, 'Elohim <WG2316> shall reveal <WG601> <WG5692> even <WG2532> this <WG5124> unto you <WG5213>.

Nevertheless <WG4133>, whereto <WG1519> <WG3739> we have already attained <WG5348> <WG5656>, let us walk <WG4748> <WG5721> by the same <WG846> rule <WG2583>, let us mind <WG5426> <WG5721> the same thing <WG846>.

Brethren <WG80>, be <WG1096> <WG5737> followers together <WG4831> of me <WG3450>, and <WG2532> mark <WG4648> <WG5720> them which walk <WG4043> <WG5723> so <WG3779> as <WG2531> ye have <WG2192> <WG5719> us <WG2248> for an ensample <WG5179>.

(For <WG1063> many <WG4183> walk <WG4043> <WG5719>, of whom <WG3739> I have told <WG3004> <WG5707> you <WG5213> often <WG4178>, and <WG1161> now <WG3568> tell <WG3004> <WG5719> you even <WG2532> weeping <WG2799> <WG5723>, that they are the enemies <WG2190> of the execution stake <WG4716> of Moshiach <WG5547>:

Whose <WG3739> end <WG5056> is destruction <WG684>, whose <WG3739> 'Elohim <WG2316> is their belly <WG2836>, and <WG2532> whose glory <WG1391> is in <WG1722> their <WG846> shame <WG152>, who <WG3588> mind <WG5426> <WG5723> earthly things <WG1919>.)

For <WG1063> our <WG2257> conversation <WG4175> is <WG5225> <WG5719> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>; from <WG1537> whence <WG3739> also <WG2532> we look for <WG553> <WG5736> the Saviour <WG4990>, the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>:

Who <WG3739> shall change <WG3345> <WG5692> our <WG2257> vile <WG5014> body <WG4983>, that <WG1519> it <WG846> may be <WG1096> <WG5635> fashioned like unto <WG4832> his <WG846> glorious <WG1391> body <WG4983>, according to <WG2596> the working <WG1753> whereby he <WG846> is able <WG1410> <WG5738> even <WG2532> to subdue <WG5293> <WG5658> all things <WG3956> unto himself <WG1438>.
